long_description: Turn any Platypus bottle or CleanStream(TM) Gravity filter clean reservoir into a custom hydration system with this tube kit. Taste-free tube won't affect the flavor of your water. Drinking tube assembly includes HyperFlow(TM) bite valve that has one of the highest flow rates on the market. Lapel clip and easy-to-attach screw cap are included.
short_description: Turn any Platypus bottle or CleanStream(TM) Gravity filter clean reservoir into a custom hydration system with this tube kit.
